    • Method Detail

      • compileStatsBook

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack compileStatsBook(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Creates a new statistics book based for the specified player.
        Version-specific method. Include methods to check for CraftBukkit version in the implementation.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to use for statistics
        Returns:
        Book with player's statistics

      • getBookPages

        public static java.lang.String[] getBookPages(java.lang.String playerName)
        Returns the pages for the book with player's statistics. Could be used for offline players.
        It is safe to use this method with any version of CraftBukkit.
        Parameters:
        playerName - Player name to use for the statistics
        Returns:
        Array of strings, each of them representing a new page in the book.

      • isBukkitCompatible

        public static void isBukkitCompatible()
        Placeholder method. If it throws an error, server's CraftBukkit version differs from the one the plugin was compiled with.
